titleStmt.title: The mirror of diuine prouidence Containing a collection of Theodoret his arguments: declaring the prouidence of God to appeare notably both in the heauens and in the earth, and in all things therein contained: taken out of his workes De prouidentia.
De providentia. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Theodoret, Bishop of Cyrrhus.
I. C., fl. 1602.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T. C[reede] for Iohn Smithick, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstons churchyard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: A translation of selections of Theodoret. De providentia.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstons churchyard in Fleetstreet
